extendedInfo.description: Wouldn't it be great to start your day with W.O.E., a word of encouragement?Motivation To Your Mobile is a free application created to inspire you every morning, Monday through Friday, with an original uplifting message.  One thought can inspire the genius in you to do things that you never before thought were possible.10 things Motivation To Your Mobile will inspire you to do:1.  Inspire you to think2.  Inspire you to dream3.  Inspire you to share with others4.  Inspire you to look forward to greatness5.  Inspire you to want more out of life6.  Inspire you to challenge yourself7.  Inspire you to lead8.  Inspire you to have confidence9.  Inspire you to think positive instead of negative10.  Inspire you to never forget that you canThe inspirational messages displayed each day are original content authored by encouragement speaker Derrick Hayes.  You can get more information about Derrick and his work at http://www.derrickhayes.com.

reviews.title: Helps a sad girl
reviews.comment: Im really down. Thank you for this

reviews.title: T. Ross
reviews.comment: I knew there was something special about you, way back when as freshmen at TSU. You had that hustle to innovate outside the box. Way to go!

reviews.title: Please update to the latest version
reviews.comment: Quotes will only be updated every day of you are using the latest version of the app (version 1.6.3). This is due to a change in how the site hosting the content/quotes is configured.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Widget Please!
reviews.comment: I absolutely love the simple yet inspiring phrases. It would be great if the app offered a widget so I could have a daily quote on my home screen!
